query:
SELECT l.id, l.title, l.moduleId, m.slug as moduleSlug, l.orderIndex 
FROM lessons l 
JOIN modules m ON l.moduleId = m.id 
WHERE m.slug IN ('marco-zero', 'norte') 
ORDER BY m.orderIndex, l.orderIndex;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2KYc1YeAxisra92.root --database A48QXSJ39Mff5dJxBnQcxi --execute SELECT l.id, l.title, l.moduleId, m.slug as moduleSlug, l.orderIndex 
FROM lessons l 
JOIN modules m ON l.moduleId = m.id 
WHERE m.slug IN ('marco-zero', 'norte') 
ORDER BY m.orderIndex, l.orderIndex;
